name: Firehouse Shredded Beef
description: Hungry bellies? Nothing like a hearty, beef dish to turn 'em into happy bellies. Take a couple minutes to prep the roast, then let your slow cooker do its thing. This is a great solution to any of your meal prep woes.
preparation: Cut roast lengthwise into 3" thick slices. Heat oil in Sauté Pan and brown beef 2 min per side.
In a slow cooker, combine seasoning with broth and tomato paste. Place beef in slow cooker, turning to coat with seasoning mixture. Cover and cook on low 6 hrs.
Remove beef from slow cooker onto a cutting board. Using two forks, shred beef. Add shredded beef back into slow cooker and stir to combine with sauce.
Serve in tacos, burritos, sandwiches, rice bowls, and more.
tips: Swap 3 lbs (1.3 kg) boneless, skinless chicken for beef.
Swap water for beef broth and add salt, to taste, before serving.
